alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Delaware; Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 4:23PM EDT until April 21 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Choctaw Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Hilliard, Marysville, Worthington, Powell, Plain City, Mechanicsburg, Choctaw Lake, New California, Polaris, Milford Center, Shawnee Hills, Ostrander, Riverlea, Unionville Center and Alum Creek State Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 72 and 74. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 114 and 124. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Delaware; Franklin; Madison; Union
